TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationId extends System.Object

summary.span: 所含信息用于唯一标识基于清单的应用程序。

span.span: Contains information used to uniquely identify a manifest-based application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序标识组成发布服务器的公共密钥、 应用程序名称、 目标处理器体系结构、 应用程序区域性和应用程序版本。An application identity consists of the publisher's public key, the application name, the target processor architecture, the application culture, and the application version. 应用程序标识属性值对应于应用程序清单中包含的信息。The application identity properties values correspond to information contained in the application manifest. 有关应用程序清单的详细信息，请参阅[ClickOnce 应用程序清单](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243)。For more information about the application manifest, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243). 由类来标识基于清单的应用程序。 is used by the class to identify a manifest-based application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示属性通过获取从使用创建的实例当前正在执行基于清单的应用程序。The following code example displays the properties by obtaining the from an instance created using the for the currently executing manifest-based application. [!code-csharp[System.ApplicationIdentity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ApplicationIdentity/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ApplicationIdentity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ApplicationIdentity/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建并返回当前应用程序标识的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current application identity.

returns.span: 对象，表示与原件完全相同的副本。

span.span: An object that represents an exact copy of the original.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的副本是否等于原始如证实具有方法。The copy returned by this method is equal to the original as substantiated by the method. 原始数据库和副本哈希代码也是相等的。The hash codes for the original and the copy are also equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可以包括语言信息，例如，"EN-US"。The value can include language information, for example, "en-US". 有关区域性值的信息，请参阅。For information about culture values, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示属性通过获取从使用创建的实例当前正在执行基于清单的应用程序。The following code example displays the property by obtaining the from an instance created using the for the currently executing manifest-based application. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取应用程序的目标处理器体系结构。

span.span: Gets the target processor architecture for the application.

value.span: 应用程序的处理器体系结构。

span.span: The processor architecture of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的值包括"msil"，"x86"、"ia64"和"amd64"。Valid values include "msil", "x86", "ia64", and "amd64". 默认值为"msil"，即 Microsoft 中间语言，这意味着所有的程序集都是与平台无关，并且公共语言运行时将它们编译，在需要应用程序时。The default is "msil", or Microsoft intermediate language, which means all your assemblies are platform independent, and the common language runtime will compile them when they are needed by your application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示属性通过获取从使用创建的实例当前正在执行基于清单的应用程序。The following code example displays the property by obtaining the from an instance created using the for the currently executing manifest-based application. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ApplicationIdentity#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ApplicationIdentity/CS/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ApplicationIdentity#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ApplicationIdentity/VB/program.vb#9)]

public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ PublicKeyToken { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取应用程序的公钥标记。

span.span: Gets the public key token for the application.

value.span: 一个包含应用程序的公钥标记的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array containing the public key token for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公钥令牌由在其下的应用程序签名的公钥的 sha-1 哈希的最后 8 个字节表示。The public key token is represented by the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the application is signed. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示属性通过获取从使用创建的实例当前正在执行基于清单的应用程序。The following code example displays the property by obtaining the from an instance created using the for the currently executing manifest-based application. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
